content:
Using FORGE R4 to define a new extension, element type stuck at value[x] even though choice type has been selected.
In FORGE R3, once the choice type has been selected, it will rename the element type e.g. value[x] to valueString.
Any suggestion how to get it work? Pls advise, thanks.

pasted image

Hi @Maria Hu, please see my answer to your other question:
https://chat.fhir.org/#narrow/stream/179166-implementers/topic/Forge.20R4.2022.2E0.20Create.20new.20extensions
